name: curiously
content:
curiously adverb
(INTERESTED)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows that you are interested in learning about people or things around you: "Why did you break it?" Jack asked curiously A group of reporters looked at her curiously. See
curious
More examplesFewer examples"So what did you think when I made my announcement?" she enquired curiously.She glanced up at him curiously."What did it feel like?" Perkin said curiously.
